comments.text: VerifiedViral Coffee Mousse I tried out the Viral 3 Ingredient Coffee Mousse to see if it really turns out good and it did! I added my own twist to it by enriching it with some whipped cream and serving it over a cookie base.And now it was ready to impress all coffee lovers!Full detailed recipe pinned in the comments below..#coffeemousse #viralrecipe #recipe #recipes #food #coffee #easyrecipes #pankajbhadouria #homemade #coffeetime Coffee MoussePreparation time: 10 minutes Serves:5-6Ingredients:4 tbsp  coffee powder2/3 cups sugar2/3 cups chilled water 2 cups Whipped cream 6 digestive cookiesChocolate to garnishMethod:Whip together the coffee, sugar, chilled water for 3 minutes till soft peak stage.Fold in1/2 cup coffee mousse in the whipped cream.Line serving glasses with 1 crumbled cookie. Top with coffee cream and pipe out coffee mousse over the cream in swirls.Garnish with grated chocolate and serve.6h

VerifiedFrom Scratch: Peri Peri Sauce Craving that fiery Peri Peri kick? Make your own Peri Peri sauce right at home â€” no fancy ingredients needed!And it is completely preservative and chemical free.Use it as a dip, marinade, or drizzle it over your favorite dishes for an extra punch of flavor.Best part? It stays fresh in the fridge for up to a month!Do let me know if you want the recipe of a peri peri seasoning too and Iâ€™ll share it with you!#fromscratch #periperisauce #pankajbhadouria #recipe #recipes #food #sauce #homemade Recipe:Peri Peri SaucePreparation time: 10 minutes Cooking time: 10 minutes Ingredients:1 red bell pepper2 pepper chillies 2 tbsp lemon juice2 tbsp apple cider vinegar1 medium onion4-5 garlic cloves3 tbsp brown sugar1 tsp oregano1 tsp saltA handful coriander leavesMethod:Blend together all the ingredients. Bring to a boil and simmer for 3-4 minutes.Cool completely. Store in a clean glass bottle in the refrigerator.3d

VerifiedPankaj Ke Nuskhe: How to Deodorise Flasks & BottlesWhat does one do about the offensive smell experienced in flasks and bottles that have been kept for some time?You simply follow my Nuskha- a simple kitchen hack.All you need is a teaspoon of baking soda and then a tsp of white vinegar going into the flask with some water. Give it a good shake and rinse it away. And experience the odours all gone!#pankajkenuskhe #pankajbhadouria #flasks #odours #smell #bakinngsoda #kitchenhacks #tips #tipsandtricks6d

VerifiedDirty DozenDo you know what the Dirty Dozen?These 12 fruits and vegetables are called the Dirty Dozen. Why?Because these fruits and vegetables have the largest amount of pesticides and insecticides sprayed over them.These are Apples, Spinach, Bell Peppers, Green Beans, Grapes, Cauliflower, Strawberries, Blueberries, Pear, Peaches, Lettuce &  Nectarines.But you do not need to buy any expensive vegetable washes to get rid of these chemicals.All you need is a little baking soda in a large bowl of water in which you need to soak them for 15 minutes. Wash them of well and then store them.So make cleaning your Dirty Dozen a habit!#dozen #dirty #vegetables #fruits #insecticides #pesticides #pankajbhadouria #vegetables #chemicals1w
